speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0179/2006 ) by Mr Markov, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on trade and poverty: designing trade policies to maximise trade’s contribution to poverty relief ( 2006/2031(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0179/2006 ) by Mr Markov, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on trade and poverty: designing trade policies to maximise trade’s contribution to poverty relief ( 2006/2031(INI) ).
